## Documentation Issue

A clear description of the documentation issue.

## Type of Issue

Select one or more:

- [ ] Typo or grammatical error
- [ ] Unclear or confusing explanation
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Outdated information
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Code example doesn't work
- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Location

Where is this documentation located?

- File: [e.g., README.md, docs/api.md]
- Section: [e.g., Installation, API Reference]
- Line numbers (if applicable): [e.g., lines 45-60]
- URL (if applicable): [e.g., https://...]

## Current Documentation

What does the current documentation say? (Copy relevant text or link)

## Suggested Improvement

How should the documentation be improved?

## Additional Context

Any additional information that might be helpful:

- Why is this confusing or incorrect?
- How did you discover this issue?
- Screenshots (if applicable)
- Related issues or PRs

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have checked that the information is actually incorrect or unclear
- [ ] I am willing to submit a PR to fix this (optional)
